channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- USG2205BSR; USG2220BSR; USG5120BSR; USG5150BSR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- USG2205BSR; USG2220BSR; USG5120BSR; USG5150BSR

item.title: CVE-2017-17312|2024-08-05T20:51:30.524Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- usg2205bsr%3B%20usg2220bsr%3B%20usg5120bsr%3B%20usg5150bsr
item.description: Some Huawei Firewall products USG2205BSR V300R001C10SPC600; USG2220BSR V300R001C00; USG5120BSR V300R001C00; USG5150BSR V300R001C00 have a DoS vulnerability in the IPSEC IKEv1 implementations of Huawei Firewall products. Due to improper handling of the malformed messages, an attacker may sent crafted packets to the affected device to exploit these vulnerabilities. Successful exploit the vulnerability could lead to device deny of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-17311|2024-08-05T20:51:30.633Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- usg2205bsr%3B%20usg2220bsr%3B%20usg5120bsr%3B%20usg5150bsr
item.description: Some Huawei Firewall products USG2205BSR V300R001C10SPC600; USG2220BSR V300R001C00; USG5120BSR V300R001C00; USG5150BSR V300R001C00 have a DoS vulnerability in the IPSEC IKEv1 implementations of Huawei Firewall products. Due to improper handling of the malformed messages, an attacker may sent crafted packets to the affected device to exploit these vulnerabilities. Successful exploit the vulnerability could lead to device deny of service.

item.title: CVE-2017-17305|2024-08-05T20:51:30.548Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- usg2205bsr%3B%20usg2220bsr%3B%20usg5120bsr%3B%20usg5150bsr
item.description: Some Huawei Firewall products USG2205BSR V300R001C10SPC600; USG2220BSR V300R001C00; USG5120BSR V300R001C00; USG5150BSR V300R001C00 have a Bleichenbacher Oracle vulnerability in the IPSEC IKEv1 implementations. Remote attackers can decrypt IPSEC tunnel ciphertext data by leveraging a Bleichenbacher RSA padding oracle. Cause a Bleichenbacher oracle attack. Successful exploit this vulnerability can impact IPSec tunnel security.
